English.Text: Delicious desecration! What better way to enliven this truly oppressive place? As the fuse is expended there seems a longer-than-expected pause...only for the boom to sound all the mightier. "Ha-ha!" the captain rasps with glee, "pirate kings be damned!" Through the fissure made by the dynamite comes a first glimpse of the sarcophagus' sensational gilded interior, and the many riches within!
